CQ: What is the id for a test result/test set?
What is the status of the test result? (pass/fail/other?)
What is the name of the test associated with a test result?
What is the description of the test associated with a test result?
What test did this result run?
Which URL/API was used to obtain this result?
Which tool was run to obtain this result?
Which version of the tool was used to obtain a test result?
Which set of test results were obtained when invoking a service?
Do these test result correspond to a predefined rubric/test collection?
Am I allowed to share these test results? (license used)
When was this result/set of results obtained?
Which resource was used to call the service that led to this result/set of results?
What did the assessment service do to process the input to assess?
What error is returned from a test result? In a human-readable manner
What is the log associated to a test result?
Are there any suggestions associated with this test?
What are the elements affected by the outcome of this test?
How was a FAIR score computed? (i.e., which test results and metrics were used to produce a final score?)
Which quality metrics have been applied to a FAIR score? How are these computed?
Who do I complain about this test result?
What are the contact details for the person/organization who posted this FAIR test result/ Set of results?
